title: E128 A Lasagna House and Scrapbooks of Destruction
description:
Listen, we know a thing or two about chalk, salt and the date of the Civil War. This week Em's hitting us with knowledge on the most haunted house in Mississippi, the McRaven House. And Christine lays out the unbelievable story of incredibly terrible medical student, Michael Swango. We also learn it's not a good idea to mess with the chrysanthemums of an old Southern garden... and that's why we drink!
Please consider supporting the companies that support us!

author: andthatswhywedrink@gmail.com (Kast Media)
